key_themes: Technical support breakdown and distribution patterns
Labor market deterioration as primary downturn catalyst
AI infrastructure buildout offsetting cyclical weakness
Fed policy accommodation versus tightening credit conditions
risk_factors: Forced liquidations cascading from micro-caps into broader indices
2026 midterm election cycle historical 18.2% average drawdown pattern
Unemployment trend acceleration since June contradicting soft-landing narrative
Credit stress signals (Blue Owl datacenter exposure, financing conditions)
Fed credibility erosion on inflation independence versus accommodation
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: $670 put wall support (Max Pain gravitational pull), $681 call wall resistance. Watch $669 breakdown or $680 rejection. QQQ: $600 psychological support, $610-613 resistance cluster. /ES per Twitter: 6818-22 support critical - break triggers next leg down to 6789-6781
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: Breakdown below $665 opens $650s. Reclaim $685 needed to invalidate bearish structure. QQQ: $595 put wall major support, $615 call wall caps upside. Break of $595 targets lower. Max Pain pressure toward $625 (QQQ) and $670 (SPY) into expiration
